title: Social Media Coordinator - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Social Media Coordinator Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Frontline brand representative for our Sports social media department interacting and engaging with fans in real-time on social media as well as creating custom content specifically....   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
